attributes.action: press Cheshire County Council to withdraw the current town re-development plans
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the people of Macclesfield town, and our supporters, do not believe the current town redevelopment plans will benefit the character and nature of Macclesfield as a town. And hence believe the process should be withdrawn in order to be re-thought.
